channel.title: Sacred-X RSPS [718 Economy]
channel.description:
Newly ran 718 Economy RSPS, hosted by two dedicated owners. There are new updates every single day!
(Note): We are hiring staff members that we look over for 2 days or so, so if you wish to become apart of the staff team, come now!
We have many additional bosses: [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/34s3ty9.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/f0b4pd.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/dcr6g2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/dbjw5k.png[/img]
+Many more!
Teleports tab : [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/14ie9fm.png[/img]
Home : [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2a92mol.png[/img]
Additional Teleports : 1. Chillzone 2. Gamble 3. Edge 4. Nomad 5. Bork 6. Pestq 7. Commands 8. Help etc
Donator Box addition : Gives random item(extremely likely chance of rare items) [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/24qvi2u.png[/img]
Skilling Supplies : VIA strangebox [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/6f38dc.png[/img]
Stats addition : 1. Blue Partyhat [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/25kllkk.png[/img]
2. Green Partyhat [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/hwafs7.png[/img]
Note: There are plenty more things to the server, don't think I should continue this on and on, you should come and see everything for yourself. =]
*--We are here to make a great time for everyone that wishes to give us a chance as a server, and most people who do, stay for awhile. I know not everyone is going to like what we do or agree with what we do at every single situation, but we aim for complete fairness and enjoyment to all our players.
Thank you for viewing this, hope to see you on the server!! Link: http://sacredx.weebly.com/downloads.html
~The Sacred-X Owners, Gumby and Mercenary.
